|brand = Linksys |model = WAP54GP |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = G54 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point |sernum = MIN0 |fcc_id = Q87-WAP54GP |icid = 3839A-WAP54GP |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel XScale;IXP420B; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = XScale |cpu1spd = <!-- 266 / 400 / 533 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Intel;TE28F320J3C110; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 16 |ram1chip = Mira;P2V64S40ETP-G6; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = IC+;IP101; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:14:BF, 00:1D:7E |oui = 00:14:BF, 00:1D:7E
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = <!-- Number of USB Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = POE |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bg
|defaulip = 192.168.1.254 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = linksys-g |defaultssid_regex = ^linksys-g$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Gemtek |manuf_model = WAPD-127GL |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/04/2005 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 745883562817 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B000BWBU42 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Ralink;RT2560; |rad1chip2 = Ralink;; |rad1chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== OEM Gemtek WAPD-127GL (WAPD-127GL_V01)
WAP54GP serial numbers appear to start with '''MIN0'''.
The default SSID would appear to be '''linksys-g'''.
==Links of Interest== [http://www.openports.info/routermanuals/linksys/pdf/Linksys-WAP54GP.pdf Manual on ''openports.info''] [http://www.cisco.com/cisco/software/release.html?mdfid=282526487&flowid=6787&softwareid=282463166&release=1.36&relind=AVAILABLE&rellifecycle=&reltype=latest Firmware]
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=42817 On the DD-WRT forums]
